name: SmartHelio
headline: Software to prevent downtime in a solar plant
description:
SmartHelio provides a software that helps solar utilities automatically predict and prevent downtime disruptions. We help solar utilities to generate extra $200k per plant income on $10k spent using our software, by preventing 700 faults per year.

We have a platform which reads live data (current, voltage, weather parameters) from a solar plant, runs algorithms to decouple various factors for the underperformance and provides recommendations to fix it. This data is 100% available for the large scale solar in the world just using software (e.g. APIs). 

Product launch: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/heliocloud

Our cloud software is being used by 40+ leading solar developers in Europe and Asia. We have analyzed 25+ billion of  data points from over 3 GW of solar assets spread across the globe in the last 2 years.

founders.name: Govinda Upadhyay, Founder
founders.description:
Husband | Father | Sustainability | Climate change warrior| 

I am is a serial entrepreneur and work in climate domain. I want to accelerate the adoption of clean tech in our society. I have a background in Physics, Smart electrical system and climate change. I studied in Sweden, Netherlands, Switzerland and  India. I am an Indian, married to a Swiss/Japanese and live in Switzerland. I like food and travel. I became father recently. I want my child to live in a better world than mine.

founders.name: Neeraj Dasila, Founder
founders.description: Born and bred in a remote Himalayan hamlet, I learned early on how tech or even the smallest innovation can help improve the quality of life of people. With this vision, I studied Electrical Engineering at IIT Bombay and later worked on Connected Vehicles & Electric Mobility as a product manager at TATA. Then, I moved to the Govt. of India to work on sustainable energy transitions. Today, my aim is to build affordable & scalable solutions for all to tackle climate change.

#### For Solar Developers
### UncoverHiddenLosses
Leverage advanced climate data and predictive diagnostics to enhance the efficiency and reliability of your solar projects. Our solutions help developers, investors, and operators make smarter, data-driven decisions.
![](https://smarthelio.com/wp-content/uploads/AI-Driven-Waterfall-1536x1079-min.png)
[Explore AI-driven Audit](https://www.smarthelio.com/</ai-driven-audit/> "AI-driven Audit")
#### For Solar Developers
### Future-ProofSolarInvestments
Based on climate change and over 100 variables, our Climate Risk Assessment forecasts long-term solar GHI for solar developers, investors, IPPs, and banks.
![](https://smarthelio.com/wp-content/uploads/AI-Driven-Waterfall-1536x1079-min-1.png)
[Explore Climate Risk Assessment](https://www.smarthelio.com/</cra/> "Climate Risk Assessment")
#### For Plant Operators
### YourConversationalBotforFastReporting
Our solarGPT reporting tool, powered by ChatGPT, provides you with fast, accurate and customizable report. Ask any questions on your plants, O&M staff performance or get business intelligence for your expansion. All your data remains stored locally.
+
![Energy Loss Chart](https://smarthelio.com/wp-content/uploads/Group-691314556-3.png)
#### For Plant Operators
### Autopilot:TheUnifiedSolarEfficiencyPlatform
A unified platform that builds trust and transparency, serving as a single source of truth for all solar stakeholders. It effortlessly collects, processes, and generates information to boost operational and financial efficiency, providing stakeholders with actionable insights.
![](https://smarthelio.com/wp-content/uploads/AP-3.png)
[Learn more about Autopilot](https://www.smarthelio.com/</autopilot/> "Autopilot")

SmartHelio quickly proved to be the ideal solution for us. They not only identified all the errors we found with our current monitoring system but also uncovered additional failures we weren’t aware of.
**David Ebner, Project Engineer**
![](https://smarthelio.com/wp-content/uploads/verbundlogo-3-e1725884211481.png)
SmartHelio’s technology delivers two key benefits: increased PV panel power generation and enhanced safety through early detection of ground faults that could lead to overvoltage or fire risks. At Schneider, safety is our top priority, and we value these safety improvements tremendously.
**Luc Hossenlopp, CTO Digitalisation**
![](https://smarthelio.com/wp-content/uploads/verbundlogo-2-e1725884275622.png)

#### For Solar Developers
### Future-ProofSolarInvestments

#### For Plant Operators
### YourConversationalBotforFastReporting
Our solarGPT reporting tool, powered by ChatGPT, provides you with fast, accurate and customizable report. Ask any questions on your plants, O&M staff performance or get business intelligence for your expansion. All your data remains stored locally.

generated_description:
**SmartHelio: Revolutionizing Solar Plant Efficiency**

Founded in 2019 and based in Lausanne, Switzerland, SmartHelio is on a mission to transform the solar energy landscape through their software that predicts and prevents downtime in solar plants. Imagine a world where solar utilities can identify and resolve operational issues before they impact performance—this is precisely what SmartHelio delivers.

**The Pitch: Maximize Your Solar Revenue**

SmartHelio’s software enables solar utilities to potentially generate an extra $200,000 in revenue per plant for an investment of just $10,000. They achieve this by preventing an impressive 700 faults each year, harnessing real-time data such as current, voltage, and weather parameters from solar assets. The underlying technology involves sophisticated algorithms that analyze multiple performance factors and deliver actionable recommendations.

**Data That Matters**

In just the last two years, SmartHelio has processed over 25 billion data points, managing more than 3 GW of solar assets globally. This data isn't just fluff—it powers their predictive analytics and is foundational for their recommendations, making their platform essential for any serious solar player. 

With a team of 12 and supported by Y Combinator’s W22 batch, SmartHelio has secured clients across Europe and Asia, proving its worth in a rapidly growing industry that values efficiency and reliability.

**Product Offerings**

Their standout products include:
- **Autopilot**: A predictive software designed to automate performance monitoring.
- **Climate Risk Assessment (CRA)**: Long-term forecasting based on climate data and risk analysis, helping solar developers and investors make informed strategic decisions.
- **AI Audit**: A one-time diagnostic tool that identifies hidden losses and provides recommendations for improvement.

Want to see it in action? They're offering demos, which could be your chance to dive into the future of solar performance tracking.

**Recognition in the Industry**

SmartHelio's innovative approach has not gone unnoticed. They’ve been featured in prominent publications and recognized with awards—most recently named "Start-Up of the Year" at the RE Start-Up Live competition. Their commitment to tackling climate challenges puts them squarely in the spotlight of the emerging solar tech scene.

**Why SmartHelio?**

In a world where downtime can equate to substantial losses, SmartHelio’s intuitive software provides peace of mind that solar systems are running at optimal performance. With a clear focus on combining innovative technology with actionable insights, they help their clients not just to react but to proactively manage their assets—and that’s a game changer. 

For more information, or to book a demo, visit [SmartHelio's website](https://www.smarthelio.com/).
